comment.text: This translation key is used to display the text "Reset client secret" in a reset dialog component, specifically within the OAuth category of developer tools. It appears as a header on a modal dialog that allows users to reset their client secret.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'إعادة تعيين السر السري للعميل' while technically correct, is overly literal and not the most natural way to express 'Reset client secret' in Arabic. The term 'سر سري' (secret secret) is redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: إعادة تعيين مفتاح العميل (I'aadah ta'yeen miftaah al-'ameel)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Obnovení důvěrného klientského klíče" is a bit too literal and verbose. While technically correct, it doesn't flow naturally. 'Client secret' is often referred to more simply in Czech in a technical context.
The wording 'důvěrného klientského klíče' is a little clunky. Better flow with a simpler phrasing.

The translation "Վերականգնել հաճախորդի գաղտնի բանալին" (Verakanvel hachxor'di gaghthni banalin) translates to 'Restore client secret' rather than 'Reset client secret'. While 'restore' is close in meaning, 'reset' is more accurate in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Վերակողմնորոշել հաճախորդի գաղտնի բանալին" (Verakognmoroshel hachxor'di gaghthni banalin) which more closely aligns with 'reset'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ຣີເຊັດຄວາມລັບຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້" literally translates to "Reset the secret of the user." While understandable, it's not the most natural or precise translation of "Reset client secret." "Client" is missing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຣີເຊັດຄວາມລັບຂອງໄคล້ອນท์ (Reset the client secret)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Resetare cheie secretă' isn't the most natural or accurate translation of 'Reset client secret'. While technically correct, it's a bit literal. A more idiomatic translation would be 'Resetează parola clientului' or 'Resetează cheia clientului'.

The translation 'පාරිභෝගික රහසය නැවත සකසන්න' while technically conveying the meaning of 'Reset client secret', is a bit formal and not the most natural phrasing in Sinhala. 'පාරිභෝගික රහසය' is a direct translation of 'client secret' which might not be understood by all users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'මුළුතැන්පත් රහසය යාවත්කාලීකරණය කරන්න' (Muluthenpatha rahasaya yawatakalikarana karanna) which translates to 'Update client secret' or 'නව මුළුතැන්පත් රහසය සකසන්න' (Nava muluthenpatha rahasaya sakasanna) - 'Set a new client secret'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'reset' is directly translated as 'resetuj'. While understandable, it's more natural to use a Serbian equivalent for 'reset' in this context. 'reset' is often used as is in technical Serbian, but a more precise and common alternative would be 'поништи' (ponisti).
The translation maintains the English word 'client' without adapting it to Serbian. While understood, using the Serbian equivalent would be more consistent.
